subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Battling with David Newhan for the final reserve spot, outfielder Ben Johnson leads the Mets this spring in hits (10) and batting average (.385) and shares the lead in home runs with two.
snippet: Battling with David Newhan for the final reserve spot, outfielder Ben Johnson leads the Mets this spring in hits (10) and batting average (.385) and shares the lead in home runs with two.
